page.title: 12The Ghost of Porch Cottage
page.content: {Porch Cottage}is one of a row of three cottages in{Withycombe Village}Road; they all used to be one cottage. There have been many reports of sightings of this ghost in Porch Cottage garden and sometimes in the house. When my grandad lived there he kept some chickens and every night they made an awful noise.Even in the heat of summer there was a cold spot at the bottom of the garden. One spotting of the ghost was by Simon Oldham.{"What I {saw was a blue glow with white {patches",}he said. Other proof we have is a photograph taken that shows a glowing shape at the end of the garden. We believe it is the ghost of someone who died in Porch Cottage.
